name: Link Link Donuts
description:
Link Link Donuts is a classic elimination game. You tap two same icons, they will be eliminated if they can be linked by 3 or less lines. You will pass the level if you clear all icons within limited time. Gear up for this addictive casual game and you won't be able to put this game down for hours.

Features:
-Very cute and sweet HD graphics.
-Game Center leaderboards.
-60 levels all free.

Enjoy!
